This is the welcome screen of this app and I will put some lorem text here and below it one button so you can click on it and navigate to the Instructions screen
Instructions of how to use the app

"The purpose of this app is to save a list of shoes. 

By accessing the next screen you can see a list of saved shoes in which nothing may have been saved yet.

To introduce new shoes you have to press the button where it will take you to the detail screen where you can fill in the necessary information and save it.

Changes will be reflected instantly on the list screen."
